title: Land with house for sale in St. Joseph Street, heart of Thelwatta junction in Negombo (next to the Cargills Food City and Mega Keells Supermarket)
location: St. Joseph Street, heart of Thelwatta junction in Negombo, Negombo
details:
19.2 perches land with House for Sale in heart of The Telwatte Junction, St. Joseph Street, in Negombo, (next to the Cargills Food City and Mega Keells Supermarket-walking distance).
House Facing road name: St. Joseph's Street.
10 meters to A3 Colombo Negombo main road

House is also close to:
Arpico Supermarket
Leading school in Negombo town
Negombo Nawaloka Hospital, General Hospital
100 meters to newly built Hatton National Bank in Thelwatta junction in Colombo Negombo Road
Commercial Bank in Thelwatta junction in Colombo Negombo Road
Negombo Municipal Council in Thelwatta junction
Odel in Thelwatta junction
Dominos pizza in Thelwatta junction
Pizza Hut in Thelwatta junction and all other restaurants.
The place and House is good for tourism/doctor/business or to reside.
House was built in 2002.
Please call directly to owner Neil: Phone number :81-07036623624 or 81-7036623624.
Brother Lalith: phone number :0772955779 in Sri Lanka.
“INSPECTION ONLY FOR GENUINE BUYERS, AND NEED PRIOR APPOINTMENTS.
"STRICTLY NO BROKERS OR AGENTS."
"Call advertiser for Price." and Price can be negotiated .
“CLEAR DEED”
මීගමුවේ ශා. ජෝසප් වීදිය, තේල්වත්ත හන්දිය, කාගිල්ස් ෆුඩ් සිටි සහ කීල්ස් සුපර්මාර්කට් අසල පිහිටි නිවස සමඟ පර්චස් 19.2 ක ඉඩමක් විකිණීමට ඇත.සංචාරක ව්යාපාරයට / වෛද්යවරයකුට/ ව්යාපාරයට හෝ වාසය කිරීමට සුදුසු ස්ථානයක නිවස පිහිටා ඇත . වැඩිවිස්තර සදහා අමතන්න නීල් : දුරකථන අංකය: 81-07036623624 හෝ 81-7036623624.
ලලිත්: දුරකථන අංකය: 0772955779

"තැරව් කරුවන් හෝ නියෝජිතයින් නැත."
"මිල සඳහා වෙළඳ ප්රචාරකයා අමතන්න." මිල ගණන් සාකච්ඡා කළ හැකිය.
